sentence.Network_en: She checked the seating arrangements before the guests filed into the dining-room.
sentence.Network_cn: 在客人们鱼贯进入餐厅之前，她核实了一遍座位安排。

sentence.Network_en: Hotels operate a collection service for their guests from the airports.
sentence.Network_cn: 宾馆为客人提供机场接机服务。

sentence.Network_en: The subject came up during a pre-dinner drink with our guests.
sentence.Network_cn: 在与客人喝餐前酒的时候，有人提到了这个话题。

entry.def: A guest is someone who is visiting you or is at an event because you have invited them.

example.ex: She was a guest at the wedding...
Their guests sipped drinks on the veranda.
example.tran: 他们的客人在游廊里浅酌着美酒。

entry.def: A guest is someone who visits a place or organization or appears on a radio or television show because they have been invited to do so.

example.tran: 经常出现在访谈节目中的特邀嘉宾

example.ex: Dr Gerald Jeffers is the guest speaker...
example.tran: 杰拉尔德·杰弗斯博士是特邀演讲人。

entry.def: A guest is someone who is staying in a hotel.

example.ex: I was the only hotel guest...
example.tran: 我是宾馆里唯一的住客。

example.ex: Hotels operate a collection service for their guests from the airports.
example.tran: 宾馆为客人提供机场接机服务。

entry.tran: 做特邀嘉宾；做特邀演员；客串
entry.def: To guest means to take part in a performance or a match as a guest, rather than as a regular member.

example.ex: He guested for one or two League sides...
example.tran: 他在一两支联赛队伍中做过外援。

example.ex: The band have recently guested on records by Ringo Starr and Tears For Fears.
example.tran: 这个乐队最近在林戈·斯塔尔和“恐惧之泪”乐队的唱片中客串过。

entry.def: If you say be my guest to someone, you are giving them permission to do something.

example.ex: If anybody wants to work on this, be my guest.
example.tran: 如果哪位想干这个，请便。

Sentence.sentence: Hosts and guests were matched up by Airbnb, a firm based in San Francisco.
I think he'll be good with the guests at the front desk.
The curtains were never drawn, even at night, so guests got a view of the lake and fountains outside which were lit up at night – a very attractive sight
As you can see, ladies and gentlemen, the guests were seated very informally around this oval table, which would add to the relaxed atmosphere.
